crossStoreSearch.searchByName: Search by name, brand, or UPC...

crossStoreSearch.noStoresInStock: No stores with recent in-stock reports found. Try expanding your search.
crossStoreSearch.initialText: Search by brand, type, or name to find stores that have your formula in stock.

crossStoreSearch.locationErrorRetry: Could not get your location. Please try again.

alternatives.noAlternatives: No alternative formulas found for this product.
alternatives.disclaimerText: Always consult your baby's pediatrician before switching formulas. These are suggestions based on type and availability, not medical advice.
alternatives.footerNote: Alternatives are sorted by compatibility and availability. WIC contract brands are always covered by your benefits.
alternatives.noAlternativesMessage: We couldn't find alternative formulas for this product at this time.

formulaAlertsList.title: My Formula Alerts

formulaAlertsList.infoText: Alerts automatically expire after 30 days. Renew before expiration to keep receiving notifications.

formulaAlertsList.renewError: Failed to renew alert. Please try again.
